directions: Place the water and the ham hock in a large pot with a tight-fitting lid.  Bring to a boil.  Lower the heat to very low and simmer covered for 30 minutes.
Add the collards and the hot pepper flakes the pot.  Simmer covered for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Add the vegetable oil and simmer covered for 30 minutes.
ingredients: 4 pounds collard greens, rinsed and trimmed
title: Southern Collard Greens
